title: What about it?
body:
Why don't Riot set a deny system. Deny minions, tower and ally (denied successfully when ally's Hp is lower than 10 hp). That way, ignite won't be as easily to cast (more challenge and more consideration before casting it). Hard to get more farm and cs, make the game longer and create more strategy games. 
{{champion:74}}

replies.body:
There is a reason for this.
Dota2 + HoN + most other mobas have this mechanic.
But league doesn't have it for a few reasons.
Stated waaaaaay back in late beta, early season 1.

League is meant to be easier for new players to play.
So not adding in a "Deny" mechanic only makes League more appealing for new players, who are new to mobas.

It also makes it easier to play, when coming form Dota or HoN (I've played both)
As you don't have to worry about that stuff.
